page.title: 05N.Herts Equitation Centre
page.content: The centre has been open for about 15 years and is very popular. Elaine Firth showed us round. She is 18 years old and had worked there for nine months.There are 55 horses all kept separately.They are fed on pony nuts, barley, oats, or a mixture of all three. Some horses have wood shavings on the floor instead of straw. Rex has a single stable as he wrecks everything. There is a back yard, a front, and a middle yard where the horses are kept. The ponies are kept in a long shed with lots of sections in it. There is a big horse box, it holds six horses and has living quarters. There is an indoor school where children are taught and where horses are schooled.
